text: maraivanavarrin cavikal avanitame irukkinrana. Avar(ril ullavar)rai avanait tavira verevarum ariyamattar. Nilattilum, nirilum ullavarraiyum avan nankarivan. Avan ariyamal or ilaiyum utiruvatillai. Pumiyin (alattil) atarnta irulil (putaintu) kitakkum (katuku ponra ciriya) vittum, pacumaiyanatum, ularntatum avanutaiya telivana (pativup) puttakattil illamalillai
